00094 static command_def_t  shell_utils[]={
00095   
00096   {"chomp",    util_chomp,       "removes final newline character"},
00097   {"cmp",      util_cmp,         "compares two expressions"},
00098   {"diff",     util_diff,        "lists differences between two expressions"},
00099   {"eq",       util_cmp,         "test if two expressions are equal"},      
00100   {"meminfo",  util_meminfo,     "prints information about memory use"},
00101   {"ne",       util_cmp,         "test if two expressions are different"},
00102   {"shell",    util_shell,       "executes a real shell command"},
00103   {"sleep",    util_sleep,       "suspends script execution for some time"},
00104   {"timer",    util_timer,       "timer management command"},
00105   {"wc",       util_wc,          "counts the number of char/words/lines in a string"},
